scripts.pretest: if exist cypress\reports; then rmdir /S/Q cypress\reports; fi;
scripts.cy:open:local:non_staging: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @api_migrated and @non_staging_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:open:local:staging: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @api_migrated and @staging_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.tag:stable:local:non_staging: cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @api_migrated and @non_staging_test",environmentName=local
scripts.tag:stable:local:staging: cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @api_migrated and @staging_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.tag:stable:ci: xvfb-run cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @api_migrated and @non_staging_test",environmentName=ci
scripts.tag:stable:pr:ci: xvfb-run cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@pr and @stable_test",environmentName=ci
scripts.tag:stable:release:ci: xvfb-run cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@release and @stable_test",environmentName=ci
